title: Block Quote: BLOCKQUOTE
name: blockquote
description:
The
element contains text quoted from another source. A typical rendering might be a slight extra left and right indent, and/or italic font. The
typically provides space above and below the quote. Single-font rendition may reflect the quotation style of Internet mail by putting a vertical line of graphic characters, such as the greater than symbol (>), in the left margin. Example of use: I think the play ends

Soft you now, the fair Ophelia. Nymph, in thy orisons, be all my sins remembered.

but I am not sure.
